original_text: (At that time, I stood between the Lord and you. I repeated the Lord's message to you. You were afraid of the fire, so you did not go up the mountain.)
korean_text: 그 때에 너희가 불을 두려워하여 산에 오르지 못하므로 내가 여호와와 너희 중간에 서서 여호와의 말씀을 너희에게 전하였노라 여호와께서 이르시되

sentences.original_text: I stood between the Lord and you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 주님과 당신들 사이에 서 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: I repeated the Lord's message to you
You were afraid of the fire
so you did not go up the mountain
